text: EU or Ёлочные игрушки ("Christmas tree decorations") is a Russian electronic music group, generally considered to be part of the IDM genre, formed in 1997 in Saint Petersburg, and consisting of Sasha Zaitsev and Ilya Baramiya. They have also worked with Stanislav Baretsky. ==Partial discography== * Warm Math (Pause 2) * Christmas Baubles and Their Strange Sounds (Lo Recordings) * Tuner (Pause 2) * Reframing (Pause 2) * Электронщина (Electronschina) 2005 ==External links== * Pause 2 EU Biography * Boomkat Discography Category:Intelligent dance musicians Category:Musical groups established in 1997 Category:Russian musical groups Category:Russian electronic music groups
title: EU (group)
